flawed_nl_solution:
The box weighs 120 pounds and she's going to use half of it to make applesauce so she'll use 120/2 = <<120/2=60>>60 pounds for applesauce
The box weighs 120 pounds and she'll use 60 pounds for applesauce so that leaves 120-60 = <<120-60=56>>56 pounds of apples
She has 56 pounds of apples and she needs 4 pounds to make a pie so she can make 56/4 = <<56/4=14>>14 pies
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 56. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
